title: "Garen just ulted me for 2000 true damage, Fucking broken needs perma ban"
body: ya, he ulted you when you were at 10 hp. a baby wolf could have killed you at that point.

replies.body: no I think people are upset at the fact that he's ulting you at near 50% of your hp while doing that kind of damage just because you so happened to kill his teammates.
It takes ~3700 missing health to take 2000 damage from Garen's ult at rank 3. You should be more concerned about the players building 6 warmogs to even be able to take that kind of damage at 50% HP.

5 warmongs and cinderhulk

{{item:3157}}  Someone who was in Zhonyas stasis could have killed you

As a fed adc I took 48% magic damage from his ult while I wasn't the villain. To be fair, I face checked a bush which allowed him to get the initial 52% damage but, why do single target 0 cc ults hit so hard :(
It can hit that hard _because_ it's single-target and doesn't have CC. :P
if you're the villain, this ult will NOT kill you if you're at 48% hp. I think the math nerds say it's 40%. So you must've already been down some hp when he did that.

It has a base damage + scaling off missing health. Around level 16 with 30 mr and 800 out of 1600 hp, garen rank 3 ult would hit for 845 magic damage.

Don't ignore 525 base damage. You wouldn't ignore Brand ult base damage would you?

Baby Wolf OP Plz Nerf...

http://i.imgur.com/8c87uNB.jpg"

I've still seen Garen's ult kill a pretty decked out tank at one-third health, which is a little crazy, but hey, come on: at any given time, only one champ is at risk of that, and b) you know if it's you, and c) with all these glass-cannon psycho-steroids coming in from the PBE, I don't think Riot needs to dial back its tank patch.

Riot's philosophy: "The Problem: SOME champions are broken. Solution: EVERY champion should be broken."

Then EVERY fan will be sadistically happy. I salute you dev team. You're all badasses. Ignore the naysayers:

"And when everyone's super, no one wi-" SHUT UP INCREDIBOY!!! >:(

Little do you guys know, but me and my friends found the secret to defeating garen:
Kill everybody EXCEPT garen, THEN kill garen. c:

no
he 2 tanky and does a shitt ton  of damage so after u get low while killing off the enemy team he'll find u guys and then freakin get even more fed
nice try tho

If he's going AD Garen then of course he will wreck face and kill people, BUT as a result of going AD he will be squishier and your team can probably burst him before he does anything too major.

If he's going Juggernaut, then your team should be able to ignore him with mild peel, a nunu snowball or a thresh flay perhaps.

If he's going full tank then you can ignore him.

He may be annoying in lane, but he's quite easy to deal with if he's not uber duber fed.
Late game Juggernaut Garen does just enough damage to your ADC where it can't be ignored unfortunately.

Which he can only do on champions that are the villain. Just be happy that he can't reset that or he will be disabled instead of benched (if you know who I am referring to). 

Lastly, that wouldve been a waste of an ult just for someone who is not necessarily "10hp" but enough to die without using ult. Garen would be better off holding on to that for the other champions waiting to spawn. Asking for a perma ban for a champion that is meant to "**_execute_** " is just silly.

I kill an enemy, get the mark.

My ally kills an enemy, doesn't get the mark, it stays on me.
